juzs.text: Kare no ato, ware wa sono min ni taishi ten kara gunzei o tsukawashi wa shinakatta. Mata-so suru made mo nakatta
Tada hitokoe sakebu dake de, kare-ra wa kieusete shimatta
A, awarena shimo be-tachi yo. Kare-ra wa shito ga kuru tabi, chosho shite kakatta
Kare-ra wa kidzukanai no ka, jibun-tachi izen ni iku sedai no mono o ware ga horoboshi, kare-ra wa 2-do to kaeranai to iu koto o
Sorezore mina wa,(shinpan no hi) isseini ware no mae ni mesa reyou
Kare-ra e no shirushi no 1tsu to shite wa, ware ga shinda daichi o yomigaera se, kokumotsu o sore kara seisan shi, sore o kare-ra ga taberu koto ga age rareru
Mata ware wa, soko ni natsumeyashi ya budo no en o moke, sonoaida ni izumi o waki dasa seru
Kare-ra wa sono kajitsu o taberuga, soreha kare-ra no te ga tsukuridashita monode wanai. Soredemo kansha shinai no ka
Kare no eiko o tataeru. Kare wa daichi ni haeru mono, kare-ra jishin mo, mata kare-ra no shiranai mono mo, subete shiyu ni tsukura reta katadearu
Mata kare-ra e no shirushi ni wa, yoru ga aru. Ware ga sore kara hiru o doka seru to, miyo, makkura ni naru
Mata taiyo wa, kisokutadashiku unko suru. Kore mo zen'no zenchina okata no setsuridearu
Mata tsuki ni wa, tengu o furiwaketa. (Sore o kayotte) natsumeyashi no oita yohei no yo ni (hosoku natte) modotte kuru
Taiyo ga tsuki ni oitsuku koto wa narazu, yoru wa hiru to saki o arasou koto wa dekinai. Sorera wa, sorezore no kido o oyogu
Mata mansai shita fune ni, ware ga kare-ra no shison o hakonda koto mo shirushi no 1tsudearu
Mata ware wa kare-ra ga noru,(-gai no benrina) norimono o tsukutta
Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra o obore saseru koto ga dekiru. So nareba, kare-ra o tasukeru mono wa naku, sukuwa re wa shinai
Tada ware no jihi ni yotte tsukanoma o kyoraku suru dakedearu
Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata no mae ni aru mono, mata ushiro ni aru mono o osore nasai. So sureba anata gata wa, kanarazu jihi ni azukarerudearou.' To iwa rete mo (mimiwokasudokoroka)
nushi kara no shuju no shirushi ga shimesa rete mo, sukkari, se o mukete shimau

Mata,`arra ga anata gata ni sadzuke rareta mono o, hodokose.' To iwa reru to, fushinjin'na mono wa shinko suru mono ni iu. `Arra ga o nozominara,(o jibun de) yashinawa reru to iu mono o, doshite watashi-tachi ga yashinau koto ga arimashou ka. Anata gata wa, akiraka ni omoichigai o shite iru dakedesu
Mata, kare-ra wa iu. `Anata gata no iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba, nanji kono (shinpan) no yakusoku (ga hatasa reru no)desu ka
Daga kare-ra ga ronso shite iru ma ni, hitokoe no sakebi ga (totsuzen) kare-ra o osou dakede wanai ka
Sonotoki kare-ra wa, yuigon suru koto mo, mata kazoku no tokoro ni kaeru koto mo dekinai
Soshite rappa ga fuka reru to, kare-ra wa hakaba kara (dete),-nushi no omoto ni isoideiku

Kare-ra wa iu. `A , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi o fushido kara yobiokoshita no wa daredeshou ka. Kore wa, jihibukaki okata ga yakusoku nasa reta toride wa arimasen ka. Shito-tachi no kotoba wa shinjitsudeatta nodesu ka
Tada hitokoe narihibikeba, isseini kare-ra wa ware no mae ni meshi atsume rareru
Sonohi ni wa dare mo, sukoshi mo futona atsukai o ukezu, anata gata wa, tada jibun no okonatta koto ni taishi mukui rareru
Hontoni rakuen no nakama-tachi wa, kono Ni~Tsu, yorokobi ni 忙 Ga shi
Kare-ra wa sono haigusha-tachi to, kokage no nedoko ni yorikakaru
Soko de kare-ra wa, kajitsu ya nozomi no mono o nandemo e rareru
Jihibukaki nushi kara `heian'are.' To no o kotoba mo aru
Anata gata tsumibito-tachi yo, kyo wa hanarete hikae nasai
Adamu no shison yo, akuma ni tsukaete wa naranai to, ware wa anata gata ni meirei shinakatta ka. Kare wa anata gata no kozen no tekidearu
Anata gata wa ware ni tsukae nasai. Sore koso tadashi michidearu
Tashika ni kare (akuma) wa anata gata no daibubun o mayowa seta. Doshite anata gata wa satoranakatta no ka
Kore wa anata gata ni yakusoku sa rete ita, jigokudearu
Anata gata wa fushinjindeatta tame ni, kyo soko ni hairu nodearu
Sonohi ware wa, kare-ra no kuchiwofujiru. Suruto sono-te ga ware ni katari, kare-ra no ashi wa, sono okonatta koto o rissho suru
Ware ga nozomeba, kare-ra no ryome o mekura ni suru koto ga dekiru. Kare-ra wa (tengoku e no) michi o sakinjiyou to suruga, doshite mitosu koto ga dekiyou ka
Ware ga nozomeba, kare-ra o sono basho de katachi o kaeru koto mo dekiru. So nareba kare-ra wa, iku koto mo kaeru koto mo dekinai
Daredemo choju sa seru sai ni wa, ware wa sozo o gyaku ni modora seyou. Kare-ra wa, soredemo satoranai no ka
Ware wa kare (muhanmado) ni uta o oshienakatta. Sore wa kare ni fusawashikunai. Kore wa (arra no) kunkai mago kata nai kuruandeari
ikeru mono ni keikoku o atae, mata fushinjin'na mono ni taishite wa wa o kotoba ga kudasa reru
Ware ga tezukara kare-ra no tame ni tsukutta kachiku o kare-ra ni shoyu sa sete iru no o minai no ka
Ware wa, sore o kare-ra (no yo) ni fukusa seta. Sorede, kare-ra wa kore ni nori, soshite taberu
Mata kare-ra wa (sono soto ni mo) iroiro sore o riyo shi, mata nomimono o eru. Soredemo kare-ra wa kansha shinai no ka
Kare-ra wa, arra no soto ni jashin o erabi nantoka tasuke rareyou to suru
Sorera (jashin-tachi) wa, kare-ra o tasukeru chikara wa naku, mushiro kare-ra no kata ga jashin o mamoru tame gunbi o totonoete iru shimatsu
Anata wa kare-ra no iu koto de, kanashinde wa naranai. Hontoni ware wa, kare-ra no kakusu koto mo gen wasu koto mo shitte iru
Ningen wa kangaenai no ka. Ware wa 一精滴 Kara kare o tsukuttade wanai ka. Sorenanoni miyo, kare wa kozen to ha mukatte iru
Mata kare wa, ware ni nazoraeru mono o hikiai ni dashite, jibun no sozo o wasure, iu. `Dare ga, kuchihateta hone o ikikaera semashou ka
Itte yaru ga i. `Saisho ni o tsukuri ni natta kata ga, kare-ra o ikikaera seru. Kare wa subete no hi zobutsu o shiri tsukushite ora reru
Midori no ki kara, anata gata no tame ni hi o tsukura reta no mo karedeari, dakarakoso anata gata wa sore ni yotte moyasu
Ten to ji o sozo nasa reta kare ga, kore ni ruisuru mono o tsukuri enaidearou ka. Iya, kare wa saiko no sozo-shadeari, zenchi de ara reru
Nanika o nozoma reru to, kare ga `are.' To o meiji ni nareba, sunawachi aru
Kare ni koso subete no sho san'are. Sono o te de ban'yu o togyo nasa reru okata, anata gata wa kare no omoto ni kisa reru nodearu
Seizento retsu o nasu-sha-tachi ni oi te
Karitate ou mono ni oi te
Mata kunkai (no kuruan) o yomi kika seru mono ni oite, chikau
Hontoni anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no omodearu
Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono no shu, mata hinode o tsukasa doru omodearu
Hontoni ware wa, shinshin de kaso no ten o kazari
(arra no meirei ni) sakarau akuma ni taisuru mori to shita
Kare-ra wa happo kara uta re, saiko no kaigi o nusumi kiku koto wa dekinai
Gekitai sa rete, kare-ra wa towa no chobatsu o ukeru
Tocho shi eta mono ga atte mo, hakunetsu no hono ga tsuiseki suru
Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) ni toe. `Kare-ra to ware no tsukutta mono (tenshi) no dochira ga tsuyoku tsukura rete iru ka.' Ware wa motomoto, nebari no aru doro de kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu
Anata wa kantan shite iru to iu no ni, kare-ra wa chosho suru
Keikoku sa rete mo, kare-ra wa keikoku o ukeirenai
Mata kare-ra wa, shirushi o mite mo chosho suru bakari
Soshite kare-ra wa iu. `Kore wa akiraka ni majutsu ni chigai arimasen
Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara,(mata) yobiokosa remashou ka
Toi sosen-tachi mo (issho nidesu ka) to iu
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Sonotori. Anata gata wa iyashime rareru nodearu
Sore wa tada hitokoe no sakebidearu. Sonotoki kare-ra wa (osoroshi kokei o) manoatari ni mite
a nasakenai, kore ga shinpan no hidesu ka.' To iu
Kore wa anata gata ga shinjinakatta kubun no hidearu
Fugi o okonatte ita-sha-tachi, sono tsuma-tachi, mata kare-ra ga arra o sashioite hai shite ita mono-tachi o atsume nasai
Kare-ra o hi goku e no michi ni tsurete ike
Iya, kare-ra o mata sete oke. Kare-ra ni tazuneru koto ga aru
Anata gata ga tasukeawanai no wa do shita koto ka
Iya, kyo bakari wa, kare-ra mo (shinpan ni) fuku suru
Kare-ra wa tagaini chikadzuki tazune au
Ippo wa iu. `Hontoni anata gata wa, migi kara kimashita
Suruto taho wa iu. `Iya, anata gata wa,(motomoto) shinjade wa arimasendeshita
Mata, watashi-tachi wa anata gata ni oshitsukeru ken'i mo arimasendeshita. Soreni anata gata wa hangyaku no todeshita
Sore de omo no o kotoba ga, watashi-tachi ni jissho sa reta ima, watashi-tachi wa,(chobatsu o) ajiwawaneba naranai
Watashi-tachi wa anata gata o mayowa setaga, watashi-tachi jishin mo mayotte ita nodesu
Koshite sonohi, kare-ra wa,(subete) tomoni chobatsu o ukeru
Hontoni ware wa kono yo ni tsumi o okashita mono o jobunsuru
Kare-ra wa,`arra no soto ni kami wa arimasen.' To tsuge rareru to, itsumo koman ni natta
Soshite,`kichigai shijin no tame ni, watashi-tachi no kamigami o sutete naru monodesu ka.' To itte ita
Iya, kare wa shinri o motarashite,(kare izen no) yogen-sha-tachi (no Keisuke) o kakusho suru monodearu
Anata gata wa, kanarazu itamashi chobatsu o ajiwaudearou
Dose mina anata gataga okonatta koto no mukuidearu
Daga arra no chuseina shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu
Sorera no mono ni wa, sadame no onkei ga ari
(yorokobashi) kajitsu, soshite eiyo ga (sadzuke rare)
shifuku no rakuen no naka de
nedoko no ue de mukaiau
Kiyoi izumi kara kunda hai wa, kare-ra ni yukiwatari
mashiro (na bishu wa), nomu mono ni kokochiyoi ama-sa
Kore wa, zutsu o moyosazu, yowa se mo shinai
Mata kare-ra no soba ni wa, fushime-gachina oki me (no otome) ga iru
Ka no on'na-ra wa, chuibukaku mamora rete iru tamago no yo
Yagate kare-ra wa, tagaini chikadzuki tazune au
Kare-ra no hitori ga, kuchi o kitte iu. `Watashi ni hitori no shitashi tomo ga imashita
Kare wa itte ita. “Anata made (fukkatsu no hi o) shinjite iru nodesu ka
Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara, hontoni shinpan sa reru nodeshou ka.”
Mata itta. `Ma minasan mioroshite mi nasai
Sokode kare ga miorosu to, hi goku no tadanaka ni kare no sugata ga mieta
Kare wa itta. `Arra ni kakete, anata wa mosukoshi de watashi o hametsu sa seru tokorodeshita
Moshi omo no onmegumi ga nakattanaraba, watashi wa kanarazu hikitate rareru mono no naka ni itadeshou
Watashi-tachi (rakuen no nakama) wa, saisho no shi dakede mata
shinu koto wa nai nodesu ka. Mata, watashi-tachi ga, chobatsu o ukeru koto wa nai nodeshou ka
Sodearunara kore wa, shijo no kofuku no jojudesu
Kono yona koto no tame ni, kodo shi doryoku subekidesu
Sore wa kekkona kantaide wanai ka. Soretomo zakkumu no ki (o toru no) ka
Ware wa kono ki o fugi o okonau mono e no kokoromi to shite, yoi shita nodearu
Sore wa jigoku no soko ni haeru ki de
sono jitsuwa, akuma no atama no yodearu
Kare-ra wa kore o tabete, hara wa sore de ibbai
Sore kara ue ni futto suru yu o sosogi tasa re
sorekara hi goku ni kaeri tsuku nodearu
Kare-ra wa sosen no mayotte ita no o mitomenagara mo
sono ashiato o isoide (aruite) ita nodearu
Mukashi no oku no sosen-tachi mo, tashika ni mayotte ita
Daga ware wa kare-ra ni, kanarazu keikoku-sha o noko wa shita
Miruga i. Keikoku sa rete mo mushi shita mono no saigo ga, dodeatta ka o
(Daga) arra no chuseina shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu
Katsute nufu wa ware ni aigan shita. Ware wa mottomo sugureta oto-shadearu
Ware wa, kare to sono kazoku o dainan kara sukutta
Soshite kare no shison o ikinokora seta
Mata ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare no tame ni (shukufuku no kotoba o) tometa
Banbutsu (ningen, tenshi, Jin) no naka de tokuni nufu no ue ni heian'are.' To (ware kara no arigatai o kotoba o)
Ware wa kono yo ni, tadashi okonai no mono ni mukuiru
Hontoni kare wa, shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta
Sorekara ware wa sono soto no mono o, obore saseta
Mata kare no kokei-sha no nakaniha iburahimu ga ita
Kare ga junseina kokoro o motte kare no omo no moto ni yattekita ori ni
jibun no chichi ya sono ichizoku ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata no suhai suru mono wa nanidesu ka
Arra o sashioite 瞞 Shi no kamigami o o nozomina nodesu ka
Ittai, ban'yu no omo ni tsuite, anata gata wa dono yo ni kangaete oidena nodesu ka
Sonotoki kare wa Moroboshi o hitome mite
itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni (kokoro ga) itamu
Hitobito wa kare ni se o mukete satta
Sonotoki kare (iburahimu) wa, kare-ra no kamigami ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata wa tabenai nodesu ka
Anata gata wa, doshitemo no o iwanai nodesu ka
Sokode kare wa, kare-ra (guzo) o migite de utta
Sonotoki hitobito wa, awatete kare no sho e yattekita
Suruto kare wa itta. `Anata gata wa,(jibun de) kizanda mono o suhai suru nodesu ka
Hontoni arra wa, anata gata o tsukuri, mata anata gataga, tsukuru mono o mo (tsukura reru)
Hitobito wa itta. `Kare (iburahimu) no tame ni ro o kizuki, moesakaru hi no naka ni nagekomi nasai
Kono yo ni kare ni sakubo o meguraseyou to shitaga, ware wa kare-ra o sanzan'na me ni awa seta
Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa omo no omoto ni ikou. Kanarazu watashi o michibika rerudearou
Omo yo, tadashi jinbutsu ni naru yona (musuko) o, watashi ni o sazuke kudasai
Sorede ware wa, yasashi omoiyari no aru danji o (sazukeru to iu) kippo o tsutaeta

(Kono-ko ga) kare to tomoni hataraku toshigoro ni natta toki, kare wa itta. `Musuko yo, watashi wa anata o gisei ni sasageru yume o mimashita. Sa, anata wa do kangaeru nodesu ka.' Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Chichiyo, anata ga meiji rareta yo ni shite kudasai. Moshi arra ga o nozominaraba, watashi ga taeshinobu koto ga o wakarideshou
Sokode kare-ra ryonin wa (meirei ni) fuku shite, kare (kodomo) ga gaku o (ji ni tsuke) utsubuse ni natta toki
ware wa tsugeta. `Iburahimu yo
Anata wa tashika ni ano yume o jissen shita. Hontoni ware wa, kono yo ni tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru
Kore wa akiraka ni kokoromideatta
Ware wa okina gisei de kare o aganai
suenagaku kare no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa
Iburahimu ni heian'are.'(To itte)
Kono yo ni ware wa, tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru
Hontoni kare wa, waga shinjinbukai shimo bedeatta
Mata ware wa tadashi jinbutsu, yogen-sha isuhaku no (tanjo no) kippo o kare ni tsutaeta
Soshite ware wa, kare to isuhaku o shukufuku shita. Daga kare-ra no shison no nakaniha tadashi okonai o suru mono mo ari, mata akiraka ni mizukara o sokonau mono mo atta
Ware wa, musa to harun ni onkei o hodokoshita
Mata kare-ra ryonin, soshite sono min o okina sainan kara sukuidashi
ware ga tasuketa tame ni kare-ra wa (sono kon'nan o) kokufuku suru koto ga dekita
Nao ware wa, ryonin ni (jiri o) meiryo ni sa seru keiten o sazuke
kare-ra o tadashi michi ni michibiita
Ware wa ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare-ra no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa
Musa to harun ni heian'are.'(To itte)
Kono yo ni ware wa, tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru
Hontoni kare-ra ryonin wa shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta
Hontoni iruyasu mo, shitodeatta
Kare ga sono min ni ko itta toki o omoe. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka
Anata gata wa baru ni inotte, saiko no sozonushi (arra) o misuteru nodesu ka
Arra koso anata gata no shu, mukashi no fuso-tachi no omode wa nai nodesu ka
Daga kare-ra wa kare (iruyasu) o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Dakara kanarazu (shobatsu ni) nozomudearou
(Kare-ra no naka) keiken'na, arra no shimo be wa betsudearu
Ware wa ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa
Iruyasu ni heian'are.'(To itte)
Kono yo ni ware wa, tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru
Hontoni kare wa shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta
Ruto mo (ware ga) tsukawashita monodeatta
Miyo, ware wa kare to sono kazoku no subete o sukutta
Ato ni nokoru mono no naka ni ita, roba no soto wa
Soshite ware wa,-gai no mono o horoboshite shimatta
Anata gata wa kare-ra no (iseki no) katawara o, hiru
yoru kayotte iru. Anata gata wa sore demo satoranai no ka
Hontoni yunusu mo, shitodeatta
Kare ga (ni o) mansai shita fune ni (notte) nogareta toki
kare wa kuji o hiite, makete shimatta
(Soshite umi ni nagekoma reruto) taigyo ni marunomi ni sa re, kare wa jiseki no nen ni kara reta
Kare ga (kaigo shite omo o) tataenakattanaraba
kare-ra (hitobito) ga (fukkatsu shite) okosa reru hi made, kanarazu kare wa sakana no haranouchi ni tomattadearou
Daga ware wa, arehateta (kishibe) ni kare o uchiageta. Kare wa yande ita
Ware wa kare no ue ni, 1-pon no Hisago ki o shigera se (kage o tsukutta)
Soshite 10 man-ri, matawa sore ijo (no min) ni kare o tsukawashita
Kare-ra ga shinko ni haittanode, ware wa shibashi gense no kyoraku o yurushita
Sate kare-ra ni toe. `Anata gata no omo wa musume o mochi, kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) wa musuko o motsu to iu no ka
Soretomo kare-ra wa, ware ga tenshi-tachi o on'na ni tsukutta to shogen suru no ka
Miyo, kare-ra no iu koto wa tsukurigotodearu
Arra ga ko o umareru to wa, kare-ra mo uso-tsuki no todearu
Kare wa musuko yori mo, musume o erabareru to suru no ka
Do shita no ka. Anata gata wa do handan suru no ka
Anata gata wa nao kunkai o ukeirenai no ka
Soretomo anata gata ni meiryona ken'no ga aru no ka
Anata gata no iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba, anata gata no keiten o dashite mi nasai
Kare-ra wa, kare to Jin wa shinruidearu to itte iru. Daga Jin wa jibun-tachi ga (chobatsu ni) nozomu koto o yoku shitte iru
Arra ni tatae are. (Kare wa) kare-ra ga haisuru mono kara (chozetsu nasa reru)
Daga kenkyo ni hoshi suru arra no shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu
Daga anata gata ni shite mo, anata gataga suhai suru monode mo
kare ni hanko shite (shinja-tachi o) yuwaku suru koto ga dekiyou ka
Moesakaru hi de, yaka reru mono wa betsuni shite
(Seiretsu shite iru-sha-tachi ga iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa onono sadame no busho o motte imasu
Watashi-tachi wa (hoshi no tame) seiretsu shite
tsutsushinde (arra o) tatae 唱念 Shimasu
Mata, kare-ra wa itsumo itte ita
Moshi watashi-tachi ga, mukashikara kunkai o motte itanara
Watashi-tachi mo, tashika ni arra no kenkyona shimo bedeattadeshou
Tokoroga (jissai ni kuruan ga atae rarereba) sore o kyohi suru.Daga mamonaku kare-ra wa shirudearou
Tashikani ware no kotoba wa, waga tsukawashita shimo be-tachi ni sudeni kudasa rete iru
Kare-ra wa, kanarazu tasuke rareyou
Hontoni ware no gunzei wa, kanarazu shori o eru nodearu
Anata (muhanmado) wa kare-ra kara shibarakunoaida tozakatte
kare-ra o kanshi shi nasai. Yagate, kare-ra wa mezamerudearou
Daga kare-ra wa, waga chobatsu o isogi motomete iru
Daga sore ga jissai ni kare-ra ni kudaru to, sore made keikoku o ukete iru dake ni nezame no warui asa to narou
Sorede anata wa kare-ra kara shibarakunoaida tozakatte
kare-ra o kanshi shi nasai. Yagate, kare-ra mo mezamerudearou
Anata no shu, itoku no shu, kare-ra ga haisuru mono kara (chozetsu nasa reru) omo ni tatae are
Shito-tachi ni heian'are
Ban'yu no shu, arra ni tatae are
Sado. Kunkai ni michita kuruan ni kakete
Iya, shinko no nai-sha-tachi wa, koman de hanko-tekidearu
Ware wa kare-ra izen ni, don'nani oku no sedai o horoboshita kotodearou. Kare-ra wa, mohaya nogare enai toki to natte (jihi o) kou
Mata kare-ra wa, jibun-tachi no naka kara keikoku-sha ga deta koto ni odoroki, fushinjin-sha wa iu. `Kore wa majutsu-shidesu. Uso-tsukidesu
Kare wa oku no kamigami o, hitotsu no kami ni shite shimau nodesu ka. Kore wa mattaku, odoroki itta kotodesu
Soshite, kare-ra no choro-tachi wa tachisarinagara (sono ba ni ita nakama ni iu. ) `Iki nasai. Soshite anata gata no kamigami o mamori toshi nasai. Kore wa (isshinkyo no oshie) mattaku no 企-Ra midesu
Watashi-tachi wa kore made no oshie de, Konna koto o kiita koto ga arimasen. Kore wa tsukuribanashi ni sugimasen
Watashi-tachi no ma de, an'na otoko ni dake o tsuge ga kudatta to iu nodesu ka.' Iya, kare-ra wa ware no kunkai ni, utagai o daite iru. Iya, kare-ra wa mada ware no chobatsu o ajiwatta koto ga nai
Soretomo kare-ra wa, iryoku narabinaku, megumi oi anata no omo no, jihi no takaramono o motte iru no ka
Kare-ra wa tenchi, soshite sonoaida no ban'yu no, taiken o motte iru no ka. Sorenara kare-ra ni tedate o sa sete,(ten no gyokuza made) nobora se nasai
Shikashi are wa, ugo no shu de tada haiso suru bakari
Kare-ra izen ni mo, nufu no min, ado (no min)oyobi kensei o hari megurashita firuaun mo
mata samudo (no min) ya ruto no min, oyobi mori no min mo shito-tachi o toto o kunde uso-tsuki yobawari shita
(Korera wa) kai shito-tachi o uso-tsuki yobawari shi, sorede ware kara no chobatsu ga kakujitsu ni kudatta
Korera no mono mo, ka no hitokoe o matsu dakedearu. Soreni wa ikkoku no yuyo mo nai
Kare-ra wa,`omo yo, watashi-tachi no sazukaru bun o seisan no nichiizen ni, isoide kudasai.' To iu
Anata wa kare-ra no kotoba o taeshinobe. Soshite waga shimo bedearu kengo no hito daudo o omoe. Hontoni kare wa,(-nushi no) meirei ni fuku shite sanbi shitsutsu tsuneni (omo no omoto ni) kaetta
Ware wa yamayama o shitagawa se, kare to tomoni asayu ni sanbi sa se
mata chorui mo,-shu tte, subete no mono ga omo no meirei ni fuku shite sanbi shitsutsu tsuneni (omo no omoto ni) kaetta
Sokode ware wa kare no oken o kyoka shi, eichi to dankotaru ketsudan-ryoku o kare ni sazuketa
Anata wa ronso-sha no monogatari o kiita no ka, hitobito ga watashi-shitsu no kabe o norikoete

daudo no tokoro ni haitte kitanode kare wa odoroita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Osoreru koto wa arimasen. Kore ga sosho no tojisha no sohodesu. Ippo ga taho ni fusei o hatarakimashita. Shinri ni yotte watashi-tachi no ma o sabaite kudasai. Fukohei ga nai yo ni, watashi-tachi o koseina michi ni onmichibiki kudasai

Kore wa, watashi no anidesu. Kare wa 99-to mo mehitsuji o motte ori, watashi wa (tada) 1-to shika motte imasendeshita. Tokoroga kare wa, sore o mo jibun ni makase nasai to itta nodesu. Soshite kotoba takumi ni watashi o ii makasete shimatta nodesu

Kare (daudo) wa,`kare ga anata no hitsuji o, torikomou to shita no wa, tashika ni futodesu. Hontoni kyodo de shigoto o suru mono no oku wa, tagaini okashi au. Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudaga, sore wa maredesu.' To itta. (Sonotoki) daudo wa, ware ga kare o kokoromita koto o Yuiri,-nushi no o yurushi o koi, reihai ni hirefushi, kaigo shite omo no omoto ni kaetta. 〔Sajida〕
sorede ware wa, kare (no ayamachi) o yurushita. Kare wa (ima) hontoni ware ni chikadzuki, takona (satori kitta) kaeri-sho ni iru

Daudo yo, ware wa anata o chijo no dairi-sha ni shita. Dakara hitobito o, shinri ni yotte sabaki, shiyoku ni shitagatte, arra no michi o fumihazushite wa naranai. Arra no michi kara mayou mono wa seisan no hi o wasureta mono de, kanarazu kibishi chobatsu ni au
Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru mono o, 戯-Ra ni tsukuranakatta. Sore wa shinko no nai mono no 億測Dearu.Daga (izure jigoku no) hi o ajiwau shinko no nai mono koso awaredearu

Ware ga shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono to, chijo de aku o okonau mono to onaji ni atsukau koto ga arou ka. Ware ga (akuma ni taishi) miwomamoru-sha to, jaaku no mono to o onaji ni atsukaudearou ka
Ware ga anata ni kudashita Keisuke wa, shukufuku ni michi, sono shirushi o chinshimokuko suru tame no monodeari, mata shiryo aru-sha-tachi e no kunkaidearu
Ware wa daudo ni suraiman o sazuketa. Nanto sugureta shimo bede wanai ka. Kare wa kaigo shite tsuneni (ware ni) kaetta
(Aru Ni~Tsu no) tasogaretoki, shunme ga, kare ni kenjo sa reta toki no koto o omoiokoshi nasai
Kare wa itta. `Hontoni watashi wa,(konoyo no) subarashi mono o medete, yoru no tobari ga oriru made,-nushi o nenzuru koto o wasurete shimatta nodesu
Sa, sono uma o tsurete maire. Soshite kare wa, umanoashi to kubi o kiriotoshite shimatta
Mata ware wa suraiman o kokoromi,(-byo o atae) jutai no kare o isu ni sueta. Sonogo kare wa kaifuku shi
itta. `Omo yo, watashi o o yurushi kudasai. Soshite kosei no dare mo mochi enai hodo no okoku o watashi ni o atae kudasai. Hontoni anata wa yutaka ni atae rareru katadesu
Sokode ware wa,-fu o kare ni shitagawa seta. Sore wa kare no omou mama ni, sono meirei ni yotte nozomu tokoro ni shizuka ni fuku
Mata ware wa shaitan-tachi o,(kare ni fukuju sa seta. Sono nakaniha) daiku ga ari sensui otto mo ari
mata sono soto ni, suraiman no meirei ni fukusazu kusari ni tsunaga reta mono mo ita
(Omo wa ose rareta. ) `Kore ga ware no tamamonodearu. Anata ga ataeyou to, hikaeyou to, mondai wanai
Kare wa (ima) ware no chikaku ni ite, shiawasena (satori kitta) kaeri-sho ni iru
Waga shimo be, aiyubu o omoiokoshi nasai. Kare ga omoni mukatte,`shaitan ga watashi o nayama se, kurushimi nuite iru nodesu.' To sakenda toki o omoiokoshi nasai
(Suruto meirei ga kudatta. ) `Anata no ashi de (daichi o) fumi nasai. Soko ni wa seiryona awa-yoku to inryo no tame no (mizu) ga arou
Ware wa jihi to shite, kare ni (futatabi) kazoku o 2-bai ni shite sazuke, shiryo aru mono e no kyokun to shita

(Soshite itta. ) `Hitonigiri no kusa o te ni totte, sorede (tsuma o) ute. Anata no chikai o yabutte wa naranai.' Ware wa, kare ga yoku taeshinobu koto o shitta. Nanto sugureta shimo bede wanai ka. Kare wa (omo no meirei ni fuku shite) tsuneni (ware no moto ni) kaetta
Mata waga shimo be no, iburahimu to isuhaku to yaakobu o omoiokoshi nasai. Kare-ra wa iryoku o mochi, dosatsuryoku ga atta
Ware wa, kare-ra ga (raise no) sumai o nenjite iru to iu junsuina (shishitsu) ni yotte (menjite) kare-ra o kiyomete yatta
Hontoni kare-ra wa, wa ga me ni mo eraba re sugureta monodeatta
Mata isumairu to Aru yasaa to zu ru kifuru o omoiokose. Kare-ra wa mina sugureta monodeatta
Kore wa hitotsu no kyokundearu. Hontoni omo o osoreru mono no tame ni wa, shiawasena kaeri-sho ga aru
(Soreha) eien no rakuendeari, sono subete no mon wa kare-ra no tame ni aka reru
Sono Chu de kare-ra wa (anraku ni nedoko ni) yorikakari, takusan no kajitsu ya nomimono ga, nozomi-hodaidearu
Mata hata ni wa, fushime-gachi no onaji toshigoro no (otome) ga haberu
Korera wa seisan no hi no tame ni, anata gata ni yakusoku sa reru monodearu
Hontoni kore wa, tsukiru koto no nai (anata gata e no) tamamonodearu
(Omo o osoreru mono wa) kono yodearu. Daga hangyaku no itazurani wa, warui kaeri-sho ga arou
Sore wa jigokudearu. Kare-ra wa soko de yaka reyou. Nanto warui fushidodearou ka
(Jitsuni) kore wa, ko iu kotodaga kare-ra wa nietatsu yu to no o aji wa sa re
sono soto, kore ni ruisuru (chobatsu) o tori awa sete ukeru koto ni naru
Kore wa anata gata to issho ni, muyami ni tsukisusumu ichigundearu. Kare-ra ni wa kangei no kotoba mo nai. Hi goku de yaka reru dakedearu

Kare-ra wa (hi goku no nakama wa kare-ra no shido-sha-tachi ni) iu. `Iya, kangei sa renai no wa, anata gatadesu. Watashi-tachi no tame ni, ko shimuketa no wa anata gatadesu. Nanto warui sumai ni kita monodeshou
Suru to kare-ra wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi o koko ni tsurete kita mono ni wa, hi goku de bai no chobatsu o o kuwae kudasai
Kare-ra (hi goku no nakama) wa iu. `Watashi-tachi ga akunin no naka ni kazoete ita hitobito ga mienai nodesu. Do shita nodeshou
Watashi-tachi ga chosho shite ita mono (ga mienai). Kare-ra wa,(watashi-tachi no)-me o kurama seta node wanaideshou ka
Hontoni kore wa shinso de, hi goku no nakama no ronsodearu
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa keikoku-sha ni suginai. Yuiitsu no kata, teiko dekinai kata, arra no soto ni wa kami wa nai nodearu
Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no ban'yu no shu, iryoku narabinaku kan'yode ara reru
Itte yaru ga i. `Kore wa shiko no shirasedearu
Anata gata wa, sorekara somuki saruga
Katsute (tenshi no) takai ikai no mono-tachi no rongi ni tsuite wa, watashi wa nani no chishiki mo nakatta
Kore ga watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, tada watashi ga Komei ni keikoku suru tamedearu
Anata no omo ga, tenshi-tachi ni,`ware wa doro kara ningen o tsukurou to shite iru.' To ose rareta toki o omoe
Sorede ware ga, kare (ningen) o katachidzukuri, soreni rei o fukikondanaraba, anata gata wa fuku shite kare ni sajida shi nasai
Sokode tenshi-tachi wa, kai isseini sajida shitaga
iburisu dake wa so shinakatta. Kare wa koman de, shinko o kobamu mono to natta
Kare wa ose rareta. `Iburisu yo, ware no tezukara tsukutta mono ni sajida suru no ni, nani ga anata o samatageta no ka. Anata wa koman'na no ka, soretomo takai (iryoku aru)-shana no ka
Kare wa moshiageta. `Watashi wa kare (ningen) yori mo sugurete imasu, anata wa hi de watashi o o tsukuri ni narimashitaga, kare wa doro de tsukura reta dakedesu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Sorenara anata wa, koko kara dete iki nasai, hontoni imawashikara
Soshite ware kara no mikagiri wa, shinpan no hi made kanarazu anata no ue ni arou
Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, kare-ra ga yobiokosa reru hi made, yuyo o negaimasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata o yuyo shiyou
Sadame rareta nichiji made
Kare wa moshiageta. `Soredewa, anata no o iko ni kakete chikaimasu. Watashi wa kare-ra (ningen) subete no mono o yuwaku shimasu
Kare-ra no naka no, anata no kenkyona shimo be o nozoite wa
Kare wa ose rareta. `Sore wa shinjitsudearu. Ware kara mo shinjitsu o iu
Ware wa, anata to anata ni shitagau subete no mono de, jigoku o mitasudearou
Ie,`watashi wa kono (kuruan) ni taishi nani no hoshu mo anata gata ni motomenai. Mata watashi wa gizen-shade wanai
Kore wa sho minzoku ni taisuru kunkai nihokanaranai
Toki ga kitara, anata gata wa sore ga shinjitsudearu koto o kanarazu shirudearou
Kono Keisuke no keiji wa, iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru arra kara (kudasa reta mono)dearu
Hontoni ware wa shinri ni yotte, anata ni kono Keisuke o kudashita. Sorede arra ni tsukae, shinjin no makoto o tsukuse

Shinjin no makoto o tsukushite tsukaeru no wa, arra ni taishi tozende wanai ka. Daga kare o sashioite (hoka ni) hogo-sha o motomeru mono wa,`watashi-tachi ga kare-ra (kamigami) ni tsukaeru no wa tada watashi-tachi ga arra no o-gawa ni chikadzuku tamedearu.'(To iu). Hontoni arra wa kare-ra no kotonaru ten ni tsuite, kanarazu so no ma o saiketsu nasa reru. Arra wa, kyogi de onwowasureru-sha o onmichibiki ni nara renai
Arra ga ko o motou to o nozominara, o jibun no tsukura reru mono no naka kara, nozomi no mono o eraba reru. Kare ni tatae are. Kare wa arra, yuiitsu ni shite (ban'yu no) seifuku-shadearu

Kare wa shinri o motte tenchi o sozo nasa re, yoru o motte hiru o oi mata hiru o motte yoru o owa se, taiyo to tsuki o fukuju sa sete sorezore sadame rareta shuki ni unko sa seru. Hontoni kare wa, iryoku narabinaku yoku yurusa reru katadearu

Kare wa anata gata o hitotsu no tamashi kara tsukuri, sorekara sono haigusha o tsukuri, mata kare wa 8-to no kachiku o shiyu de anata gata ni tsukawasa reta. Kare wa anata gata o haha no tainai ni tsukura re, 3ttsu no ankoku no naka ni oite, sozo ni tsugu sozo o nasa reta. Ko no yo ni, anata gata no shu arra ni taiken wa zokusuru. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu.Nanoni anata gata wa doshite somuki saru no ka

Moshi anata gata ga shinjinakute mo, arra wa anata gata o hitsuyo to sa renai. Daga kare wa, shimo be-tachi no fushinjin o yorokoba re wa shinai. Shikashi kansha surunaraba, kare wa yorokoba reru. Omoni o ou mono wa,-gai no mono no omoni o ou koto wa dekinai. Yagate anata gata wa, jibun no omo no omoto ni kaeru nodearu. Sonotoki kare wa, anata gata no (gense ni okeru) okonai no subete o o tsuge ni naru. Hontoni kare wa,(hitobito no) mune ni daku koto o jukuchi nasa reru

Ningen wa saiyaku ni aeba omoni inori, kaigo shite kare ni kaeru. Daga, onkei ga kare no omoto kara sadzuke rareru to,-saki ni inotta koto o wasurete, arra ni doisha o haishi, kare no michi kara (hitobito o) mayowa seru. Itte yaru ga i. `Anata wa, tsukanoma no fushinjin (no seikatsu) o kyoraku suruga yoi. Hontoni anata wa, hi goku no nakamadearu

Yoru ni nemurazu me o samashite iru toki ni, sajida shi aruiwa tatte reihai ni uchikonde, raise ni sonae, mata omo no o jihi o koi negau mono (ga sode wanai mono to onajidearou ka). Itte yaru ga i. `Shitte iru mono to, shiranai-sha to onajidearou ka.'(Shikashi) kunkai o ukeireru no wa, shiryo aru mono dakedearu

Gen tte yaru ga i. `Shinko suru ware no shimo be-tachi yo,-nushi o osore nasai. Gense ni oite zenko o nasu mono ni wa, yoi (hoshu) ga aru. Arra no daichi wa hiroi nodearu. Yoku taeshinobu mono wa hontoni kagirinai hoshu o ukeru
Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa arra ni, shinjin no makoto o tsukushite tsukaeru yo meiji rare
mata watashi wa musurimu no sendatsudearu yo meiji rarete iru
Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi ga moshi,-nushi ni somuku yona koto ga areba, idaina-bi no chobatsu ga osoroshi
Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa arra ni makoto o tsukushite tsukaemasu

Anata gata wa, kare o sashioite, hossuru mono ni tsukaeruga i.' Itte yaru ga i. `Hontoni shippai-sha to wa, shinpan no hi ni, mizukara no tamashi to sono kazoku o ushinau monodearu. Hontoni sore wa akirakana shippaidearu
Kare-ra no ue wa hi no oi, kare-ra no shita mo (hi no) yukadearou. Ko no yo ni arra wa shimo be ni keikoku nasa reru. `Shimo be-tachi yo,dakara ware o osoreyo
Jashin 〔taguto〕 o sakete, sonshin sezu kaigo shite, arra no moto ni kaeru mono ni wa kippo ga arou. Dakara waga shimo be-tachi ni kippo o tsutae nasai
Okotoba o kiite, sono Chu no mottomo yoi tokoro ni shitagau-sha-tachi ni. Korera wa arra ga michibika reta monodeari, korera koso shiryo aru-sha-tachidearu
Daga kare ni taishi shinpan ga atte, chobatsu no o kotoba ga kudatta mono o (dare ga tasuke rareyou). Anata wa hi goku no naka ni iru mono o, sukueru to demo iu no ka
Daga omo o osoreru mono ni taishite wa,-kan no ue ni yakata no koro ga ari, sono-ka ni wa kawa ga nagareru. Arra no o yakusokudearu. Arra wa kesshite yakusoku o yabura renai

Minai no ka, arra ga ten kara ame o furase rare, sore o chichu ni haira sete izumi to nasa re, sorekara irotoridori no, shokubutsu o hae sase, yagate sorera ga karete kiiro ni naru no o. Sorekara, sore o kawakashite, boroboro no kuzu ni nasa reru. Hontoni kono nakaniha, shiryo aru mono e no kyokun ga aru
Arra ga, mune o hiraki isuramu to shi,-nushi kara no o hikari o uketa mono ga onajidearou ka. Wazawai naru ka na, arra no keiji o katakuna ni kobamu mono koso, akiraka ni kokoro mayoeru monodearu

Arra wa konouenai subarashi kotoba o, tagaini nita (goku o motte) kurikaeshi keiten de keiji nasa reta. Omo o osoreru mono wa, sore ni yotte hada wa ononoki furueru. Sonotoki arra o tatae 唱念 Sureba hada mo kokoro mo nagu. Kore ga arra no onmichibikidearu. Kare wa o kokoronikanau-sha o michibika reru. Daga arra ga mayou ni makaseta mono ni wa, michibikite wanai
Sore de shinpan no hi no tsuku o kao ni ukeru mono wa dodearou. Fugimono ni taishite wa iwa reyou. `Anata gataga okonatte eta koto (no batsu) o ajiwae
Kare-ra izen no mono mo (mata keiji o) kyohi shita. Sorede omoi mo kakenai homen kara, chobatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta
Arra wa gense no seikatsu ni oite mo, kare-ra ni kutsujoku o ajiwawa se rareru. Daga raise ni okeru chobatsu wa sarani oki. A, kare-ra ga sore o shitteitanaraba
Mata ware wa kakushu no hiyu o hitobito no tame ni, kono kuruan no naka de teiji shita. Kare-ra ga kunkai o ukeirereba yoi to omotte
Sukoshi mo magatta tokoro no nai, Arabia-go no kuruan de kanarazu kare-ra wa ware o osoreru koto (o shiru)dearou

Arra wa hitotsu no hiyu o teiji nasa reru. Oku no shujin ga ite tagaini arasou mono to, tadaichinin no shujin ni chujitsu ni tsukaete iru mono to kono 2-ri wa kurabete mite onajidearou ka. Arra ni tatae are. Daga, kare-ra no oku wa wakaranai nodearu
Hontoni anata wa (itsuka wa) shinu. Kare-ra mo mata shinu nodearu
Sore kara shinpan no hi ni, anata gata wa omo no gozen de, ronso su (ru koto ni nari sabaki o uke)ru
